scripts.dev: concurrently -p name -n "common,crux,crux-ui" --kill-others "npm -w common run watch" "npm -w crux run start" "npm -w crux-ui run start"
scripts.crux:dev: concurrently -p name -n "common,crux" --kill-others "npm -w common run watch" "npm -w crux run start"
scripts.crux-ui:dev: concurrently -p name -n "common,crux-ui" --kill-others "npm -w common run watch" "npm -w crux-ui run start"
scripts.format: npm run -w common format && npm -w crux run format && npm -w crux-ui run format
